abstract: Stocks fall slightly as bank shares drop.
lead_paragraph: Bank stocks fell more than the rest of the market as traders anticipated that interest rates would remain low for longer than previously forecast.

headline.main: Wall St. Slumps After Dismal Jobs Report
headline.print_headline: Modest Winning Streak Ends for Market

snippet: Bank stocks fell more than the rest of the market as traders anticipated that interest rates would remain low for longer than previously forecast.
